name: EventRelation
description: Represents a relationship between an event and another object, such as a contact or lead.
summary: The {EventRelation} object in Salesforce represents a relationship between a Salesforce event and other records, such as contacts, leads, or accounts. It allows users to associate events with specific records in the system, providing context and visibility into the interactions and engagements related to those records. This object helps sales teams track and manage their interactions with customers and prospects, improving overall sales effectiveness.
label: Event Relation
